unnormalised: 'The Lancet'ant chhapun ailea eka novea abheasant, Bhartantlea kaim rajeant novean zolmallea bhurgeant vamsaparompor cholun ailea dukhyanche vishayant chinta korpa sarkhi chal disun ailea. AIIMS Dillechi Dr. Meena Sharma hichea fuddarponnachea sodant, Thalassemia ani Sickle Cell Anemia-chea kesanchi vadh, khas korun gramin Maharashtrant ani Biharant zalea mhunn dakhoyta. Ho abheas 3 vorsham voir cholo, zannem 50+ hospitalam ani arogya kendram virkantli mahiti vicharant ghetli.
normalised: 'The Lancet'ant chhaplelea eka novea odhyoyant Bharatantle choddantt rajyamdhim navjat bhurgeanchim januki vikarancher ek chinteche dishtti aila mhunn ukttavlam. A-I-I-M-S Dillichea Doctor Meena Sharma hanni kel'lea sodantle dishtti aila ki Thalassemia ani Sickle Cell Anemia-chea kasanchi vadd zalea, khas korun gramin Maharashtra ani Bihar-ant. Teen vorshamni kel'lea odhyoyant pachas-ponn-dhum udar ani arogy kendranche mahiti voparli.

unnormalised: Eka raktachea sambandantlim lognam ani genetic screening-achi kami asop him mukhel karonnam mhunn sodhun kadlam. Ho riport dakhoyta ki lagbhog 2.5% novean zolmallea bhurgeank vicharillea bhagant vamsaparompor cholun ailea dukhanche prakar aslo mhunn nirdhar kelam. Uprant, abheas andaz korta ki Thalassemia Major aslelea bhurgeak upchar korpak tancher jivit bhar Rs. 10 lakh voir kharch yetlo, zo zaitea familik ek vhodd bhar zatlo.
normalised: Sahodhar lagin ani januki chaallninchim kamtarai mukhya karonn mhunn dishtti aileant. Survey kel'lea bhagamdhim sumar dha-ponn-don tokke navjat bhurgeank kiteim tori januki veglyanchi gonn mell'lli mhunn report dakhoita. Uprant, Thalassemia Major aslelea eka bhurgeacher upchar korpak sumar rupya dha lakh-ponn-voile kharch yetolo, zo zaitea ghoranneank bhari poddttolo mhunn odhyoyan tharavlam.

unnormalised: Sorkar atam Gujarat ani Odisha sarkhea rajyamni vhodd sankhyen dukhi aslelea lokank lagun ek desvyapi screening program suru korpacho nirdhar korta. Togne logna adim genetic margdarshan ani sonkramanacho dhoko kami korpak zagrutai muhim chalu korpak suchoitat. Dr. Sharma apnnank bhurgea chi as aslelea maibapayank 12-14 disanchea garbhavasthent genetic testing korpak ulo korta zantun dukhmachi nodar tatkalin yetali.
normalised: Sarkaran atam Gujarat ani Odisha sarkhea chodd dhokeachea lokank lagun eka deshbhoreche chaallniche yojnechi survat korpak yevjita. Dhokho kamti korpak lagun lagna-adliche januki salacho aani bodhiche campaign suru korchea mhunn expert sal dita. Doctor Sharma-n bhavi mai-bapaik bara te chaudda hafttanchim januki pariksha korpak vinonti korta, te vorvim adhim problem mellpak sakyam asta.
